## Description {#details}

Create MCExprs from relocations found in an object file.

## Public Member Functions

### createExprForCAPIVariantKind() {#a4636659aa6c1ac582dedcdd046795f98}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const MCExpr &#42; MCRelocationInfo::createExprForCAPIVariantKind (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; SubExpr, unsigned VariantKind)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Create an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> for the target-specific <code>VariantKind</code>.

The VariantKinds are defined in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/disassembler-h">llvm-c/Disassembler.h</a>. Used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexternalsymbolizer">MCExternalSymbolizer</a>. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
If possible, an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> corresponding to VariantKind, else 0.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcdisassembler/mcrelocationinfo-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcdisassembler/mcrelocationinfo-h">MCRelocationInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcdisassembler/mcrelocationinfo-cpp/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcdisassembler/mcrelocationinfo-cpp">MCRelocationInfo.cpp</a>.
